search_results.query: Speech and Language Processing: An Introduction to Natural Language Processing, Computational Linguistics, and Speech Recognition

snippet.title: Pioneered computer speech recognition
snippet.description: Frederick Jelinek, 77, a brilliant and determined engineer who overcame the challenges of a boyhood in Nazi-occupied Europe to come to the United States and teach computers how to recognize the sounds and make sense of spoken English, died Sept. 14 in Baltimore.

snippet.title: Dr. Frederick Jelinek, computer speech-recognition specialist, dies in Baltimore
snippet.description: Computer speech-recognition specialist Frederick Jelinek dies in Baltimore at 77.
